Package ptolemy.apps.hardrealtime

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Task
    In a real-time system the contained tasks and the scheduler communicate through the set of released jobs: the tasks release jobs in that set and the scheduler executes them.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Channel
    A class that abstracts the notion of a channel that connects two actors.
    DBFPlot
    A plotter for the demand bound function of periodic and multiframe tasks.
    DBFPlotEditorFactory
    An attribute that creates a task plot TaskPlot that visualizes the execution of a hard real time system.
    EDF
    A hard real-time system consists of concurrently executing actors that release jobs.
    InputModelAttributes
    Container for decorator attributes that are provided to Ptides platform inputs by analysis tools that need guarantess about the input patterns on eacn input port.
    Job
    A job represents a block of execution demand on the processing units of a hard real-time system.
    MultiFrameTask
    A multiframe task is an edge-labeled and vertex-labeled directed cyclic graph together with a current location predicate.
    PeriodicTask
    A task that releases jobs with a given deadline and execution requirement periodically.
    PtidesToMultiFrame
    When configured this attribute generates a multiframe task that simulates the behavior of the Ptides platform it is contained in.
    PtidesToMultiFrameEditorFactory
    An attribute that shows a multiframe task that corresponds to a Ptides model.
    TaskFrame
    As described in MultiFrameTask, a multiframe task rotates through a set of different job specifications.
    TaskPlot
    A task execution plotter.
    TaskPlotEditorFactory
    An attribute that creates a task plot TaskPlot that visualizes the execution of a hard real time system.
